DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare cervical muscular force control , take account proprioceptive signal , patient without cervical dystonia .
DOC.brief_title: Integration Cervical Proprioceptive Signals Patients With Cervical Dystonia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : patient present focal segmental cervical dystonia diagnose neurologist expert diseases abnormal movement sign consent study participation No Neurological affection cervical dystonia ( typical atypical parkinsonism , ... ) Severe pain , trauma disease cervical spine know suspected cervical dystonia require treatment last 6 month Ongoing neuroleptic treatment Pregnancy breastfeed Lack insurance coverage For patient , add follow inclusion criterion add : Trembling cervical dystonia Injection botulinum toxin past three month
